description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget for viewing a note, including functionalities to edit and delete the note, and displays note details with formatting.

classes.name: NoteViewScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays details of a note and provides options to edit or delete it.

methods.name: _formatMillis
methods.description: Formats milliseconds since epoch into a human-readable date string.

methods.name: _edit
methods.description: Navigates to the note editing screen and refreshes the note list after editing.

methods.name: _delete
methods.description: Deletes the current note and shows a confirmation SnackBar.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method that constructs the UI for viewing a note.
